name: Out of Sight (Nervous Composers)
description:
First released in Ludum Dare 37 in December 2016. This version has minor updates to adjust difficulty and balancing.

Music from Incompetech
https://incompetech.com/wordpress/2015/10/the-show...

What happened... last night?
Right, I got wasted...
I'm going to sleep in today...
Wait... Is someone coming?
Totally forgot about it!
Got to keep this mess...
... Out of Sight!
